EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-05-11-OpenStack Mitaka Webinar.ES-05-03-2016-OpenStack Mitaka Invite.Se
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: OpenStack Mitaka - Where has it been? And where is it going?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/openstack-mitaka-updates-webinar?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=OpenStackMitaka&utm_content=05032016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Where Has OpenStack Been and Where Is It Going? OpenStack Mitaka answers these questions with a resounding: â€œIn your data center. According to the OpenStack Foundation, Mitaka now offers greater manageability and scalability as well as an enhanced end-user experience. Join VMTurbo Technology Evangelist, Eric Wright, for OpenStack Mitaka: Updates From Release 13, where we will cover:
- A brief history of OpenStack and its ever-growing mainstream adoption - New announcements and technologies from the OpenStack Austin Summit 2016 - A rundown of the new Mitaka features, and why the unified CLI is such a big deal - Predictions for release 14, and more!
- The VMTurbo Team
